Name: ! That Bastard Is Trying To Steal Our Gold !
About the game: It's a fun puzzle game where you need to steal all gold at each level. Steal gold from the Lerpikon's dungeons! Get rich! Music in video: 'Sidewalk Shade - slower' Kevin MacLeod (incompetech com)
